languages.text: {n}Идира начинает хрипло и истерически хохотать.{/n} "Я сейчас помру от этой сказочки дерьмовой. Это что же, выходит, я во сне не свое спасение видела, а избавление этого ксеноса недобитого? Бред какой! Не верьте в эту брехню, Лорд-капитан, он явно мозги нам пудрит!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира начинает хрипло и истерически хохотать.{/n} "Я сейчас помру от этой сказочки дерьмовой. Это что же, выходит я во сне не свое спасение видела, а избавление этого ксеноса недобитого? Бред какой! Не верьте в эту брехню, Лорд-капитан, он явно мозги нам пудрит!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira bursts out laughing, her voice hoarse and hysterical.{/n} "Oh, this half-baked guff is killing me. What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира начинает хрипло и истерически хохотать.{/n} "Я сейчас помру от этой сказочки дерьмовой. Это что же, выходит, я во сне не свое спасение видела, а избавление этого ксеноса недобитого? Бред какой! Не верьте в эту брехню, Лорд-капитан, он явно мозги нам пудрит!"

Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"

What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉突然放声大笑起来。她歇斯底里地高喊起来，声音嘶哑。{/n}“哎哟，这个半死不活的家伙真的是要笑死我了。怎么，原来我在梦中看到的景象并不是我自己的救赎，而是这个半死不活的异形的‘救赎’吗？简直是胡说八道！别信他的鬼话，舰长大人！他不过是想干扰我们罢了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira bursts out laughing, her voice hoarse and hysterical.{/n} "Oh, this half-baked guff is killing me. What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉突然放声大笑起来。她歇斯底里地高喊起来，声音嘶哑。{/n}“哎哟，这个半死不活的家伙真的是要笑死我了。怎么，原来我在梦中看到的景象并不是我自己的救赎，而是这个半死不活的异形的‘救赎’吗？简直是胡说八道！别信他的鬼话，舰长大人！他不过是想干扰我们罢了！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira rompe a reír con voz ronca e histérica.{/n} «Oh, estas chorradas ridículas me están matando. ¿Significa esto que lo que veía en mis sueños no era mi salvación, sino la "liberación" de este xenos medio muerto? ¡Venga ya! ¡No se trague esta farsa, Lord Capitán, está intentando engañarnos!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira bursts out laughing, her voice hoarse and hysterical.{/n} "Oh, this half-baked guff is killing me. What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira rompe a reír con voz ronca e histérica.{/n} «Oh, estas chorradas ridículas me están matando. ¿Significa esto que lo que veía en mis sueños no era mi salvación, sino la "liberación" de este xenos medio muerto? ¡Venga ya! ¡No se trague esta farsa, Lord Capitán, está intentando engañarnos!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein heiseres, hysterisches Lachen platzt aus Idira heraus.{/n} "Oh, dieser dämliche Narr will mich töten. Heißt das etwa, dass ich in meinen Träumen nicht meine eigene Erlösung gesehen habe? Sondern die 'Befreiung' dieses halbtoten Xenos'? Jetzt hört schon auf! Glaubt diesen Schwachsinn nicht, Lord Captain, er will uns nur verwirren!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira bursts out laughing, her voice hoarse and hysterical.{/n} "Oh, this half-baked guff is killing me. What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein heiseres, hysterisches Lachen platzt aus Idira heraus.{/n} "Oh, dieser dämliche Narr will mich töten. Heißt das etwa, dass ich in meinen Träumen nicht meine eigene Erlösung gesehen habe? Sondern die 'Befreiung' dieses halbtoten Xenos'? Jetzt hört schon auf! Glaubt diesen Schwachsinn nicht, Lord Captain, er will uns nur verwirren!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは声を荒げてヒステリックに笑い出した。{/n}「ああ、こんな馬鹿話を聞いてると死にそうだわ。つまり何？夢で見たのは自分の救いじゃなくて、この死にかけの異種族の『解放』だったってこと？冗談じゃないわ！ロード・キャプテン、こんなたわごとを信じないで。こいつはあたいたちを混乱させようとしているだけよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira bursts out laughing, her voice hoarse and hysterical.{/n} "Oh, this half-baked guff is killing me. What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは声を荒げてヒステリックに笑い出した。{/n}「ああ、こんな馬鹿話を聞いてると死にそうだわ。つまり何？夢で見たのは自分の救いじゃなくて、この死にかけの異種族の『解放』だったってこと？冗談じゃないわ！ロード・キャプテン、こんなたわごとを信じないで。こいつはあたいたちを混乱させようとしているだけよ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira éclate de rire avant de vous répondre d'une voix rauque et hystérique :{/n} « Oh, toutes ces foutaises vont me rendre dingue. Ce n'est donc pas mon propre salut que j'ai vu en rêve, mais la "délivrance" de ce xénos à demi mort ? Arrêtez de me faire marcher ! Ne croyez pas un traître mot de tout ça, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, il tente juste de nous embrouiller ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira bursts out laughing, her voice hoarse and hysterical.{/n} "Oh, this half-baked guff is killing me. What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira éclate de rire avant de vous répondre d'une voix rauque et hystérique :{/n} « Oh, toutes ces foutaises vont me rendre dingue. Ce n'est donc pas mon propre salut que j'ai vu en rêve, mais la ‘délivrance' de ce xénos à demi mort ? Arrêtez de me faire marcher ! Ne croyez pas un traître mot de tout ça, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, il tente juste de nous embrouiller ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, aniden boğuk ve histerik bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Bu yarım akıllı beni öldürecek. Ne yani, rüyalarımda gördüğüm kendi selametim değil de bu yarı ölü zenonun 'kurtuluşu' muymuş? Bırak yahu! Sakın buna inanayım deme Lord Kaptan, aklımızı karıştırmaya çalışıyor!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira bursts out laughing, her voice hoarse and hysterical.{/n} "Oh, this half-baked guff is killing me. What, does that mean it wasn't my own salvation I saw in my dreams, it was this half-dead xenos's 'deliverance'? Come off it! Don't you buy any of this crap, Lord Captain, he's just trying to mess with our heads!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira aniden boğuk ve histerik bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Ah, bu yarım akıllı beni öldürecek. Ne yani, rüyalarımda gördüğüm kendi selametim değil de bu yarı ölü zenonun 'kurtuluşu' muydu? Bırak bunları yahu! Sakın buna inanayım deme Lord Kaptan, aklımızı karıştırmaya çalışıyor!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
